pages.text:
[Page Title: Menu – Cuocco Pazzo]

A Journeyof Flavors for your Palate: Explore Our Menu 
Appetizers

Bruschetta alla Napoletana

Homemade ciabatta bread topped with olive oil, garlic, red onion, fresh vine ripened tomatoes and basil

$14.95

Frittura di Calamari

Fried Calamari served with a side of homemade pomodoro sauce

$17.95

Eggplant Rollatini

Eggplant stuffed with ricotta and mozzarella cheese with parsley accents. Topped with our homemade pomodoro sauce

$15.95

Vongole o Cozze Marinara

Fresh mussels or clams sautéed in a pomodoro sauce with garlic and olive oil.

$20.49

Vongole o Cozze al Vino Bianco

Fresh mussels or clams sautéed with white wine, olive oil and garlic.

$20,49

Stracciatella Soup

Seasoned chicken broth with egg whites and spinach

$9.45

Salads

House Salad

Spring mix with roma tomato, red onions and our homemade raspberry vinaigrette

$6.95 Add 1.00 Ceasar

Antipasto Misto

Prosciutto, dry aged salami, capicola, provolone, seasoned mozzarella, mixed olives & giardiniera over balsamic glazed spring greens

$24,95

Insalata Caprese

Seasoned slices of fresh mozzarella and ripened tomatoes topped with basil and olive oil

$17,49

Fried Goat Cheese Salad

Deep fried goat cheese and prosciutto over balsamic greens and chipotle aioli

$17,95

Prosciutto Salad

Thinly sliced prosciutto and bocconcini mozzarella served over mixed greens glazed in a home-­made balsamic reduction

$16,95

Classic Dishes

Gnocchi

Potato dumplings tossed in a pomodoro, mozzarella, parmesan and basil sauce

$17,95

Melenzana al forno

Eggplant slices layered with mozzarella and grated parmesan topped with pomodoro sauce

$20,95

Lasagna alla Napoletana

Baked in a meat sauce with an assortment of cheeses including ricotta, aged parmesan, mozzarella and fresh basil

$25,95

Fettuccine Alfredo

Fettuccine pasta tossed in a creamy parmesan reduction

$17,95

Spaghetti alla Carbonara

Spaghetti tossed with sautéed pancetta, onions and egg with a touch of cream

$21,95

Spaghetti Alle Vongole Bianco o Marinara

Garlic accented clams and parley tossed in your choice of white wine sauce or pomodoro sauce

$32,95

Fettuccine Boscaiola

Pancetta, onions, mushrooms and fettuccine tossed in a besciamella sauce

$23,95

Penne alla Puttanesca

kalamata olives, onions, capers, roasted garlic and basil in a spicy pomodoro sauce

$19,95

Manicotti al forno

Rolled pasta sheets stuffed with seasoned ricotta cheese topped with pomodoro sauce, mozzarella and parmesan

$17,95

Cheese Ravioli

Homemade raviolis stuffed with seasoned ricotta cheese topped with pomodoro sauce

$17,95

Lobster Ravioli

Onion cured lobster and ricotta cheese filled shells topped with a creamy vodka sauce

$28,95

Spaghetti con Polpette

Homemade meatballs on a bed of spaghetti topped with homemade pomodoro sauc

$24,95

Pappardelle alla Bolognese

Flat egg noodles tossed in a robust meat sauce

$22,95

Salsiccia alla Griglia

Grilled sausage sautéed in a white wine sauce topped with parsley

$19,95

Veal

Vitello alla Piccata

Sautéed veal with capers and artichoke hearts, in a lemon butter sauce

$31,95

Vitello alla Parmigiana

Breaded and pan-­fried veal topped with pomodoro sauce and mozzarella cheese

$31,95

Vitello al Marsala

Sautéed veal with mushrooms and marsala wine sauce

$30,95

Vitello Saltimbocca

Sautéed veal with prosciutto, provolone and fresh sage in a white wine sauce

$32,95

Vitello Ripieno Caprese

Veal scallopini wrapped in prosciutto and stuffed with fresh basil, mozz and tomatoes. White wine and cherry tomato sauce

$34,95

Vitello alla Pancetta

Pancetta and provolone cheese over two tenderized veal cutlets in a white wine and cherry tomato sauce

$30,95

Vitello alla Vodka

Sautéed veal in a creamy vodka sauce served with a side of penne pasta

$29,95

Chicken

Pollo alla Fiorentina

Chicken breast coated with spinach, provolone cheese and roasted garlic

$27,95

Pollo alla Cacciatore

Sautéed chicken breast with mushrooms and onions, in a spicy pomodoro sauce

$24,95

Pollo alla Caprese

Sautéed chicken breast with basil, roasted garlic and slices of whole mozzarella and tomatoes in a white wine sauce

$29,95

Pollo alla Parmigiana

Breaded and pan-­fried chicken breast topped with pomodoro sauce and mozzarella cheese

$26,95

Pollo alla Griglia

Grilled chicken breast with sautéed mushrooms in a white wine sauce

$23,95

Pollo al Marsala

Sautéed chicken breast in a mushroom and cream marsala wine reduction

$24,95

Pollo Primavera

Sautéed chicken, mushroom, spinach, onion, artichoke hearts and cherry tomatoes tossed in penne pasta covered in a white wine sauce with a touch of heavy cream

$27,95

Seafood

Gamberi agli Scampi

Sautéed shrimp in a garlic, olive oil and lemon butter sauce

$29,95

Gamberi Alfredo

Shrimp in a creamy garlic alfredo sauce served with fettuccine pasta

$32,95

Gamberi e Cozze alla Piccata

Mussels and shrimp with artichoke hearts and capers in a lemon butter sauce

$33,95

Frutti di Mare

Shrimp, clams, mussels and calamari tossed in a garlic pomodoro sauce

$37,95

Salmone Al Limone

Salmon fillet In a Chablis wine and fresh lemon reduction with chopped asparagus and angel hair pasta

$32,95

Dessert

Tiramisu

$9,49

Limoncello Cake

$8,49

Chocolate Chip Cannoli

$8,95

Belgian Chocolate Mousse

$7,95

Vino Rosso
VENETO 
Luigi Righetti Amarone

100% Corvina with intense aromas of black cherries, plums and cocoa

Cantine Di’ Ora Amicone

A slow maturation in oak barrels gives notes of sweet spices and chocolate. Full bodied yet soft with aromas of fresh raspberry and black cherry.

Pasqua Passimento Rosso

Deep ruby red color Intense aromas of red cherries, cranberry and hints of vanilla and spices. Flavors of ripe cherries with soft tannins to finish
TOSCANA 
Col Di Sasso Cabernet Savignon

A ruby red intense bouquet with a fresh variety of enriched spicy notes, full and soft, balanced, easy to drink

Spezieri Col D'Orcia-Sangiovese

Dark ruby red Sangiovese, complex and fruity on the nose. Soft tannins and slightly fruity after

Querceto Chianti

A sangiovese blend with a wild cherry core that has a light sweet and sour edge to it. A straight-forward chianti that is easy to enjoy.

Melini Chianti Riserva

Made from 100% Sangiovese grapes, this chianti is a dry, round and rich wine with flavors of ripe red fruits overlaid with smoky notes

Casisano Rosso Di Montalcino

Ruby red in color, with a floral bouquet, with fruity notes of plums and red berrei combined with light hints of spices. Dry and pleasant balance between tannins and acidity. Nice and soft in the fina
ABRUZZO 
Masciarelli Montepulciano

Red wine with red berries, cherry, red currants, violets, hints of tobacco

Caldora Montepulciano

Full bodied. Intense red fruit on the pallet. With hints of vanilla
SICILIA 
Stemmari Pinot Noir

100% Pinot Noir. Mature and full-bodied, bold but not too fruity. Acidic bite, but not tart, great finish. Soft tannins

Villa Pozzi Nero D’ Avola

An intense, inky red, Nero that reveals a perfume of blackberry liqueur, white flowers, vanilla and a hint of fig
PIEMONTE 
Serralunga d’Alba Barolo

Garnet red with a full-bodied velvety texture and great balance. Intense nose with overtones of vanilla, underbrush and withered roses. Soft, very long lasting finish

Briccotondo Piemonte DOC Barbera

This is a ruby-red wine with purple highlights. The nose is packed with black fruit, especially blackberries and plums, with slight spicy overtones hinting at black pepper and cinnamon

Franco Serra Langhe Nebbiolo

Aged in French barrique barrels. Intense aromas of plum and ripe blackberries. Subtle hints of oregano and dried herbs with a touch of vanilla Dry finish

Marchesi di Barolo-Barbera Ruvei

A dark red Barbera with clean hints of wild berries and spices. Aged in traditional Slavonian oak barrels. Medium bodied

Il Vino Bianco
IL VINO BIANCO 
Mionetto - Prosecco

Light-bodied, effervescent and packing plenty of flavor, this prosecco exhibits hints of pear, orange and honeyed grapefruit

Cavit Riesling

Fruit and floral aroma merges with crisp, refreshing fruit-forward flavors with a hint of sweetness and spice

Vulcanico-Falanghina

White flowers and fruit. Refreshing and well balanced, clean finish. Straw yellow in color

Danzante - Pinot Grigio

A dry white with floral hints of citrus on the pallet. Crisp acidity. A well balanced Pinot Grigio
FRIULI 
Pighin-Sauvignon Blanc

Nodes of tomato leaf, sage and yellow bell pepper. Strawish in color with delicate greenish tinges
PUGLIA 
Tormaresca Chardonnay

A straightforward Chardonnay. Rich in tropical flavors and aromas with a well balanced medium-bodied acidity leading to a crisp signature finish
SARDEGNA 
La Cala - Vermentino

Supple, yet dry. This single-vineyard wine couples’ fullness of flavor with an underlying acidity
ABRUZZO 
Zaccagnini Pinot Grigio

Pale yellow with green nuances, a very delicate boquet of aromas. Fresh and wellbalanced flavors, with a crisp and elegant finish
PIEMONTE 
Villa Pozzi-Moscato

Pleasantly sweet moscato with aromatic hints of yellow apple, lime and pronounced honey. Slight mineralization on the tongue, with a smooth finish

The Art of Wine: An Italian Cellar in the Heart of Mount Pleasant
At Cuoco Pazzo, every glass of wine tells a story. Our carefully curated selection brings together the finest from Italian vineyards and beyond, offering flavors that perfectly complement our authentic cuisine. Let yourself be carried away on a unique sensory journey and raise a toast with us to life's little pleasures. BOOK A TABLE ✕ 
READY FOR AN AUTHENTIC ITALIAN CELEBRATION?
At Cuoco Pazzo, every meal is a special occasion. Discover how Chef Davide Davino can bring the passion and authenticity of Italy right to your table, whether dining in or hosting an event. Book a Table Catering Services Private Parties & Events No, thanks. I just want to view the menu for now.

[Page Title: Cuocco Pazzo – Trattoria]

“WHY GO TO ITALY, CUOCO PAZZO BRINGS ITALY TO YOU”

Making every day the perfect time for a Celebration.

Experience a Full Course: Appetizers, Entrees and Desserts.

While enjoying time with Family and Friends.

Choose what you like best

Our menu

Eggplant Rollatini

Meet Chef Davide DavinoCooking is not just his job, it's his
Passion In the heart of Mount Pleasant is Cuoco Pazzo, an Italian restaurant where every detail has been carefully thought out to transport you to the streets of Italy. From the intimate atmosphere to the top-quality ingredients, at Cuoco Pazzo you will live an authentic culinary experience, full of tradition and passion.
